Series.Actors: |Eliza Dushku|Olivia Williams|Tahmoh Penikett|Harry J. Lennix|Dichen Lachman|Fran Kranz|Enver Gjokaj|Keith Carradine|Alan Tudyk|Summer Glau|Alexis Denisof|Reed Diamond|Miracle Laurie|Amy Acker|
Series.Overview: The show revolves around a corporation running numerous underground establishments across the globe which program individuals referred to as Actives with temporary personalities and skills. Wealthy clients hire Actives at great expense for various purposes. The series follows the Active known as Echo, on her journey towards self-awareness.
